title: zac the forgotten champ
body: zac has gotten no love as a champ and its quite annoying, champs like yasuo, vel'koz, lissandra, jinx, aatrox, lucian, who cam out AFTER zac have personalized skins, been almost 2 years since zac came out and nothing, i love zac as a champ, and havn't heard a single thing about an upcoming skin since his release, even his release skin is extremely sub-par, just a bit odd for a champ with such a unique model to not even have a skin

replies.body: A riot person commented on another Zac skin post somewhere, that they are designing a skin for sac but it is harder than the other skins because of his character model and abilities (mainly because they don't want to just change the colour).

'champ with such a unique model'

his model is %%%%ing boring and no one plays him...... that's why

Zac is not forgotten or lost, he just isn't popular, not enough people have enough skill to play him correctly, i play him myself (rarely, not the greatest jg) but its just the skill level of players is too low, one day he will be loved one day...
